key.name: models-dir
key.description: Only used for defaul location of file search dialog

key.name: model-file
key.description: Name of the actual model file. eg. /home/user/caffe/models/[model-path]/[model-file]

key.name: deploy-prototxt
key.description: Each model has a deploy .prototxt file which should be set accordingly here. eg. /home/user/caffe/models/[model-path]/[deploy-prototxt]

key.name: max-bytes
key.description: Maximum byte size of an image (width*height*channels). Oversize images (including video frames) will be resized accordingly

key.name: proj-dir
key.description: Where to save project files

key.name: im-dir
key.description: Where to save images generated by DD

key.name: vid-dir
key.description: Where to save generated videos

key.name: im-search-dir
key.description: Default location to search for images

key.name: vid-search-dir
key.description: Default location to search for video files

key.name: is-setup
key.summary: Has the setup config been run
key.description: Has the setup config been run

key.name: output-layer
key.description: See caffe documentation

key.name: n-iterations
key.description: How many times to process the image on each octave

key.name: n-octaves
key.description: How many octaves on each loop.

key.name: n-loops
key.description: How many times to feed the result of the deepdream script back to itself.

key.name: octave-scale
key.description: Octave scale.

key.name: zoom-scale
key.description: Scale to zoom in by on each loop.

key.name: rot-deg
key.description: How many degrees to rotate by on each loop.

key.name: im-name
key.description: The base image name for saving .jpg image output. File extension is not needed and an integer will be appended if file already exists (ie. ImageName_3.jpg).

key.name: fps
key.description: Default frames per second for output videos

key.name: loops-min
key.description: The minimum no. of allowed loops on the main window selection box

key.name: loops-max
key.description: The maximum no. of allowed loops on the main window selection box

key.name: loops-incr
key.description: How much to increment the window selection box by on each click

key.name: incr-min
key.description: The minimum no. of allowed increments on the main window selection box

key.name: incr-max
key.description: The maximum no. of allowed increments on the main window selection box

key.name: incr-incr
key.description: How much to increment the window selection box by on each click

key.name: octv-min
key.description: The minimum no. of allowed octaves on the main window selection box

key.name: octv-max
key.description: The maximum no. of allowed octaves on the main window selection box

key.name: octv-incr
key.description: How much to increment the window selection box by on each click

key.name: scale-min
key.description: The minimum no. of allowed scales on the main window selection box

key.name: scale-max
key.description: The maximum no. of allowed scales on the main window selection box

key.name: scale-incr
key.description: How much to increment the window selection box by on each click

key.name: scale-dp
key.description: No. of decimal places on the main window selection box

key.name: zoom-min
key.description: The minimum no. of allowed zoom on the main window selection box

key.name: zoom-max
key.description: The maximum no. of allowed zoom on the main window selection box

key.name: zoom-incr
key.description: How much to increment the window selection box by on each click

key.name: zoom-dp
key.description: No. of decimal places on the main window selection box

key.name: rot-min
key.description: The minimum no. of allowed rotation on the main window selection box

key.name: rot-max
key.description: The maximum no. of allowed rotation on the main window selection box

key.name: rot-incr
key.description: How much to increment the window selection box by on each click

key.name: rot-dp
key.description: No. of decimal places on the main window selection box
